casebody.data:
In the Matter of Estate of Elizabeth Truitt, Deceased. Stanley B. Balbach, as Administrator of Estate of Elizabeth Truitt, Deceased, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Henry Shannon et al., Defendants. Robert Truitt et al., Defendants-Appellants.Gen. No. 9,929. (Abstract of Decision.)Opinion filed February 25, 1954;rehearing denied March 31, 1954;

released for publication March 31, 1954.

H. F. Simonson, for appellants;G. M. Webber, and Philip C. Zimmerly, for appellee.

Opinion by Not to be published in full.

Presiding Justice Reynolds.
